thread.title: Insight Asia Travel has currently installed Live Chat with Experts on website
thread.title_full: Insight Asia Travel has currently installed Live Chat with Experts on website

title: Insight Asia Travel has currently installed Live Chat with Experts on website
text: Insight Asia Travel has currently installed Live Chat with Experts on website Vietnam, 16 October 2015 -- Insight Asia Travel would like to introduce its live chat installed on its website. Now travel experts are within easy reach to tailor made a wonderful holiday for visitors.Insight Asia Travel would like to introduce its live chat installed on its website. Customers now can easily find this live chat application at the bottom of the website on the right hand. Customers can use Video Chat to send real-time video and audio, Screen Share any screen or application, easily share texts and files and have full screen option. Now travel experts are within easy reach to tailor made a wonderful holiday for visitors. On Insight Asia Travel’s website, visitors can easily find day trips, excursions, cruises, soft adventures, package tours, honeymoon trips, and family holidays. Other special interest adventures include biking and trekking, as well as culinary trips throughout South East Asia such as Vietnam, Cambodia, Laos, Myanmar and Thailand. Insight Asia Travel customizes and creates products, itineraries and experiences as requested by their clients. Day-by-day program is flexible, personalized, and creative and every detail is attended to from the minute customers begin planning trips until the day customers safely return home. Insight Asia Travel’s greatest satisfaction comes in having served large numbers of satisfied clients who have experienced the joys and inspiration of travel. Insight Asia Travel guarantees customers will have a wonderful trip. Should you have any further question, please feel free to contact Susan at (84-4) 3 9334 647 or at or visit us at http://insightasiatravel.com # # # About Insight Asia Travel: Living in South East Asia and with many years of experience in the travel industry, we are committed to delivering high-quality travel services and life-enriching, memorable holiday experiences for each and every individual. We are proud to be one of the best tour operators in the regions who offer the Highlights of Vietnam Tours, Laos Tours, Cambodia Tours, Myanmar Tours and Thailand Tours. Submitted by Susan Ta , Insight Asia Travel on Friday, 16 October 2015 at 5:52 PM
